main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Robinson Springs, Alabama on 16 Mar 67 for a duration of 5-6 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical like a saucer,The object changed colors from red to white, then black, and back to white again,There were dots around the object resembling portholes,The object hovered approximately two miles from the observers,The sighting was reported by a former Air Force pilot.
sighted object: one elliptical object with changing colors
witness description: Major - USAF (RET.), former Air Force pilot
